Package com.panviva.util.pgc.processing

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDocumentPostProcessor
    Interface describing the key methods of the Post Processing (final) stage of document conversion.
    IDocumentPreProcessor
    Interface describing the key methods for the pre-processing stage of the document conversion process.
    IPreProcessorFactory
    Pre-processor factory interface to facilitate the creation of a new DocumentPreProcesor instance.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DocumentPostProcessor
    This class manages all the details to convert a business filtered and transformed common object model (xHtml) document instance to the final SupportPoint importable xml output file.
    DocumentTransformer
    This class manages the application of business filtering and transformation rules to the intermediary common object model xHtml document.
    FileConverter
    The file converter class manages the overall process of converting a specific input document through each of the conversion stages.
    PreProcessorFactoryImpl
    Pre-processor factory implementation class allowing the creation of Document specific PreProcessors.
    WordPreProcessor
    Microsoft docx format pre-processor class to convert docx files to various target formats i.e.
    XslInstanceManager
    The purpose of this class is to manage all of the details around document specific XSL files used to transform a partitioned and filtered (business rules processed) XHTML input file to the final SupportPoint importable xml file.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SupportedDocType
    Enumeration of the different types of document supported by this converter.
